What's Due?

Due December 02 — Week 15

No Class Next Week

Thanksgiving break, no class.

Due November 18 — Week 13

P3.4: Checkpoint 4

One final draft, printed or tiled in color at half size and trimmed to size. Draft added to Miro. Full Description

Due November 10 — Week 12

P3.3: Checkpoint 3

One refined draft, tiled in black and white at full size, a color version printed on letter sized paper, both trimmed to size. Draft added to Miro. Full Description

Due November 04 — Week 11

P2 final

Final poster printed on Heavy Weight Coated (HW Coated) paper from SoA Print Studio and trimmed to the correct size. I believe the print should cost around $14.40 give or take a dollar. If it costs more than that check to make sure you are printing to the correct paper. Don’t forget to include crop marks and the bleed on the PDF you send to print. Full Description

P3.2: Checkpoint 2

Two different digital drafts, printed in color (if necessary) on tabloid sized paper (scaled to fit) and trimmed to size. Drafts added to Miro. Full Description

Due October 28 — Week 10

P2.4: Checkpoint 4

One final draft, printed or tiled in color at half size and trimmed to size. Draft added to Miro. Full Description

P3.1: Checkpoint 1

Initial research & curation document and word list (on the back of the P3 sheet). Document and word list added to Miro. Full Description

Due October 21 — Week 9

P2.3: Checkpoint 3

One refined draft, tiled in black and white at full size, a color version printed on letter sized paper, both trimmed to size. Draft added to Miro. Full Description

Exercise 6: Print with a Purpose

Bring at least one poster with you to class and hang another somewhere around campus or around town. Take a picture of the poster you hang giving some context to why you decided to hang it there. Full Description

P3: Pick an Artist

Pick an artist from the artist list on project 3. As people choose I will try my best to keep the list current.

Due October 14 — Week 8

Exercise 6: Print with a Purpose

Bring you paper stencil(s) to class with you. Full Description

Due October 07 — Week 7

P2.2: Checkpoint 2

Four digital sketches (two collage, two photographic) done at the correct proportion, printed in color on letter sized paper, and trimmed to size. Drafts added to Miro. Full Description

Due September 30 — Week 6

Exercise 5:

5 6″x9″ collages and scans or good photographs of them added to Miro. Full Description

P1 Final

Final poster printed on Heavy Weight Coated (HW Coated) paper from SoA Print Studio and trimmed to the correct size. I believe the print should cost around $14.40 give or take a dollar. If it costs more than that check to make sure you are printing to the correct paper. Don’t forget to include crop marks and the bleed on the PDF you send to print. Full Description

Ten photos from e4 and five collages from e5 brought to class (can always be more). Photos and collages added to Miro. Full Description

Read the essay and add something you thought was interesting to Miro. Link to Reading

Exercise 2: Type Effects

5 phrases printed in black and white on landscape, letter sized paper. Each phrase should be printed on its own sheet of paper. Full Description

Two digital drafts, printed in color (if necessary) on tabloid sized paper (scaled to fit) and trimmed to size. Drafts added to Miro. Full Description

Read selections from Critique by Ian Lynam and add something from the text you thought was interesting on your Miro board.
